name: Dread Doctors
description:
How to play 

use arrow keys to move .

jump is space. 

left mouse button is to shoot a fire ball.

how to lose and win 

lose 

you have 5 lives if you get hit by the enemy 3 times then you die the enemy takes 2 heath of each time it hits you.

win 

you hit the enemy to kill him and get the key and you win.

Story 

main character is Sam this is the main character you play.  there are dread doctors that are trying to kill you and make you into a robot. they are trying to make massive robot to kill everyone in the world and destroy multiple worlds in the universe.

you are Sam to save the world from the dread doctors and try and defeat them.
